title: Bug with Nami's bubble
body:
I've seen Nami's bubble fail more than a dozen times in the past two days. The bubble lands right on top of a champion (or two, or three), but nothing happens. It's as if the bubble missed. This happened multiple times against Janna and Leona, which makes me think it might be an incorrect interaction with shields. Their shields shouldn't block the bubble like Morgana's Black Shield would, but the effect is identical. Braum's shield seems to "catch" Nami's bubble, so I haven't noticed any problem against Braum. The bubble has also failed against non-shielded enemies. In my last two games, it's failed against an Ezreal, a Corki, and a Nidalee. No jumps/dashes were attempted when the bubbles failed, but all those champions do have movement skills.

At first, I was hesitant to call this a bug, because it's easy to mistake where a skill shot lands. However, in my last game alone, I counted at least 4 bubble failures. At the very least, the range indicator is flawed, if no other bug is occurring.

replies.body:
Hey! 

I'm a fellow Nami main who spams her in ranked. ^-^ I've personally not seen this issue - I've been able to land my bubbles (most recently against an Ezreal/Janna). 

I may suggest what balbraaksel did and grab a replay. It'd be easier to get a feel for what's going on. Feel free to share it on here, and I'd be happy to take a look at it.

Could be your connection or hardware.
You can record a replay then spectate that to see if you really missed or not.

I main Nami, so I play her a lot. Typically, I'd see a "fail bubble" maybe once every four or five games. Now I'm seeing four or five a game. I don't think it's my gear. Could be, but it's the same gear as before. Sometimes new patches create new bugs. This one seemed to start since the last patch.

But to rule out a connection or hardware issue you probably should get a replay of a match with a failbubble.
I've had lag where it seemed I hit something but I didn't, stuff like that happens with lagspikes.
I have seen namis bubble work just fine.
